wikipedia_page.main: David Edward McCabe (14 November 1940 – 26 February 2021) was a British fashion photographer.  He was noted for photographing Andy Warhol throughout 1964.

response: Luna was discovered by the English photographer David McCabe on the streets of Detroit around the Fisher Building in 1963. Luna was then invited to move to New York City to pursue modeling by McCabe. At first, her mother discouraged her from traveling to New York wanting her to become a nurse instead, but Luna persisted and her mother sent her to live with an aunt near the New York Harbor in New Jersey.Cutting a Figure: Fashioning Black Portraiture, Richard J. Powell, 2009
